body.name: ODK L Shaped Desk with Monitor Stand, 54 Inch Home Office Desks with Storage Printer Shelves, Reversible Corner Gaming Desk with Bookshelf for Bedroom, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 3 hrs 3 mins
features: 【Sturdy & Durable Construction】: It is flexible enough to fit into different spaces and is also sturdy and stable because of the solid frame. This wooden desk is made of high quality materials and adds a luxurious look to your space.

【Spacious Working Space】: The L-shaped design of the desk saves you space. The reversible shelf allows you to mount the shelf on the right or left side depending on your preference. While common desks on the market are 19 inches deep, our computer desk is 21.7 inches deep in the main use area. Providing enough space for you. 5-tiers storage shelves make it enough for books, printers, potted plants, etc.

【Adjustable Monitor Stand】: The Monitor Stand adds another height to your desk and It can lift up your monitor to an appropriate height, effectively improves your sitting posture. The shelf under the desk provides you with additional storage space and monitor storage location.

【Applicable Room and Function】: This corner office desk is suitable for study room, bedrooms, families, office workstation, apartments, living rooms, dormitories, etc. Great writing table with bookshelves provide sufficient space for writing, games, learning and other home office activities. In addition, open shelves help you quickly store and take office supplies efficiently improve work.

【Assembly & Service】: We provide a complete set of assembly tools. As shown in the picture, this product is very easy to assemble. Please confirm your size before purchasing. If you have any product problems, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Computer Desk with Multiple Shelves Desks with non-adjustable storage shelves greatly reduce the efficiency of space use.Ordinary L-shaped tables without storage shelves are not easy to store things and reduce the user experience. Our corner desks can be flexibly positioned to either the left or the right.The 2-person desk allows you to enjoy office and play time with friends or family.Five tier shelf creates extra space for you to store printers, books, files, etc.

High-quality Materials and Excellent Workmanship Waterproof Desktop Design This L-shaped computer desk is constructed of high-quality MDF, which is waterproof, scratch-resistant and easy to clean. Adjustable Monitor Stand The long monitor stand provides ergonomic eye height.Helps you adjust your sitting posture and reduce neck stress. Sturdy Legs The sturdy metal frame provides you with better durability and stability, and the desk can support up to 300 lbs. Adjustable Foot Pads Adjustable leg pads help prevent damage to the legs and keep the desk stable even on uneven floors.

Computer Desk with no elevated Monitor Stand NO comfortable height of visionIncorrect sitting posture will increase the burden on the spine, resulting in spine bendingIncorrect sitting posture can cause shoulder painNo additional storage space on the desktop Computer Desk with Adjustable Monitor Stand Visual height of ergonomic sitting postureRelieves spinal and shoulder and neck discomfortHelps office workers improve their sitting postureAdditional storage space on the desktop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Desk for Home Office Productivity and Organization!
reviews.reviewText: I can't stop raving about the ODK L Shaped Desk with Monitor Stand—it's been a total game-changer for my home office! Seriously, the way it's designed is genius. The L-shaped layout and the monitor stand make my workspace feel so organized and spacious, plus the extra shelves are a lifesaver for keeping my printer and office stuff within easy reach.Putting it together was a breeze, and once it was all set up, I could feel how sturdy and well-made it is. It's clear they used quality materials. And can we talk about the sleek look? It fits right in with my decor and gives my workspace a stylish boost.Honestly, for the price, this desk is a steal. It's not just about how it looks—it's improved my productivity and made my workday so much smoother. If you want to upgrade your home office without breaking the bank, this desk is absolutely worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and spacious!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a desk with more space, and also a way to lift my monitor without having to use a bunch of books! The old desk I was using had a hutch, so I was limited on how big a monitor I could use. I also had limited space on the desktop, so I couldn’t put my printer OR scanner on the desktop. The printer was on the top of the hutch, which made it difficult to add paper, change ink, etc. now I have a lot of space; the printer and scanner both fit on the desktop easily. I haven’t even begun to put things on the side shelves yet! The only thing I would change is putting adjustable height legs. I really wanted to put that file cabinet under the desk, but a: it was slightly taller than the desk, and b: the support bar on the desk goes across the middle of it.Assembly was fairly simple, with lot of extra screws and bolts. All the parts were well labeled, and the nuts, bolts, and screws were in numbered, sealed bags instead of the cardboard bubbles. The instructions can be a bit difficult to understand, but I managed to get through it all! This is definitely a two-person job…though you might be able to assemble it alone if you have room to lay the desk on its side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice desk but missing a part
reviews.reviewText: Overall happy with this desk feels decently solid and the shelves are a nice addition to the functionality of it. The assembly had good instructions and only took about an hour. Was a bit difficult doing it myself as there are a couple steps that I had to balance against the parts against a wall to do it myself. Only gripe was one of the support bars to keep the legs from spreading was not in the box so I need to be careful when moving it. And as I had already had unboxed and assembled nearly the whole thing i was left with the choice of completely taking it apart and trying to rebox it to send back to amazon as thay don't send out parts. So I decided to leave as is

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite utilitarian, it's awesome!
reviews.reviewText: This desk is such a great value. If you follow the instructions, it's very clear what to do and how to do it. The first time I ordered this, it came with a defective piece, and I reached out to the manufacturer. They responded quickly, asked for an explanation and a picture, and promptly sent me an entire new desk, free of charge, instead of making me wait multiple weeks to get the individual part of the desk shipped separately. I couldn't have asked for a smoother or easier process for a problem I couldn't have solved on my own. It went together smoothly that time, and all is well.I use it every day and it's awesome. Sturdy, sleek, and very utilitarian. With all of the thin legs, as well as the cross bars along the back sides, it's very easy to cable manage and get everything all tidied up. I have a serious amount of cables, and they are all at least somewhat neat (with the help of some adhesive hook and loop (velcro) tape, J-channel, and a ton of reusable cable ties). I have no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great desk , exceeds my needs
reviews.reviewText: i am in a wheelchair , i was able to put it all up and in place all by my self . ( was tricky ,, but got it all done ) . i had to work it in sections , and adapt the assembly order a little . yet was able to get it all done in less than 5 hrs . one issue was one part was not tapped for the screws . EASY fix there ,, just called Amazon they sent another desk over ,, and got the right part that was able to be secured . a great pleasure to work with a new desk , and the service i received for the undone part replacement could not have been any better . i am an Ham radio operator , and have 2 computers , and my TV on the desk ,, love it ,, and i can fit my power chair in to use it comfortably .

reviews.reviewerName: Spacious, Easy to Build, SturdySpacious, Easy to Build, Sturdy
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for something to help spread out your workstation, look no further. At first I felt that MAYBE the bookshelf would be too much, but actually it’s perfect, and currently houses a few things I didn’t think about.Easy to build, and instructions to follow. Gives you two options in the instructions on how to build the desk to your needs (Left facing or Right facing) which was REALLY neat to have that option.I would recommend furniture sliders if this is on carpet, because you’re going to be moving it into place, and you don’t want the desk to potentially break. I have super plush carpet though, so maybe just me.Wish it came with RGB light strips but it’s not a dealbreaker.Overall, one of the coolest desks I’ve bought, and I plan to have it for some time to come

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It will be helpful to have two people
reviews.reviewText: After ordering and putting together two of these desks I have to say I wish I had someone to help hold the pieces together while I screwed them in. The instruction booklet was very helpful and the pieces fit together rather easily. I would however suggest not to screw in everything 100% when putting on the actual table top on to the desk as sometimes it needs to be maneuvered a bit so the screws can fit into their slots. The desk itself is a good quality and the shelf once connected to the desk is very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great desk for home office
reviews.reviewText: I have a modest office space at home and needed something with some shelf space included so I didn't have to get a bunch of additional bookcases. This desk works great. It has a bigger surface area than other similar desks, which means I can have both the computer in front of me as well as my notebook to write. Love it.
